Detailed Description

V8100 board definitions.

Author:
NDA
Version:
1.0
Date:
09/2008
Provides methods, properties and defines to handle V8100 boards

Definition in file V8100.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum _V8100_COMMANDS

The board commands.

Provides an entry for supported command: keep synched with cmd_table V8100_CMD_TABLE[ ]

Enumerator:
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_NAME  Readout channel name (ex. +5V..).
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_VSET  Readout value of the voltage Set.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_VMIN  Readout minimum value of the voltage Set.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_VMAX  Readout maximum value of the voltage Set.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_VRES  Readout resolution value of the voltage Set.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_OVP  Readout value Over Voltage Protection.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_UVP  Readout value Under Voltage Protection.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_VMON  Readout value of the voltage Monitor.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_ISET  Readout value of current limit.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_IMIN  Readout minimum value of current limit.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_IMAX  Readout maximum value of current limit.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_IRES  Readout value resolution of current limit.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_IMON  Readout value of the current Monitor.
V8100_CMD_CH_MON_STAT  Readout value of channel status.
V8100_CMD_CH_SET_VSET  Set voltage Value.
V8100_CMD_CH_SET_ISET  Set Value of current limit.
V8100_CMD_CH_SET_OVP  Set Value OVP (in % di Vset).
V8100_CMD_CH_SET_UVP  Set Value UVP (in % di Vset).
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_CRNAME  Readout Crate name : 'VME8100'.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_NUMCH  Readout number of channels present.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_PSFREL  Readout of the PS Release Firmware.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_PSTEMP  Readout of the PS Temperature.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_PSSNUM  Readout of the PS serial number.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_FANSP  Readout Set value of FAN SPEED (0..6).
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_FAN1  Readout value Fan Speed 1 (RPM).
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_FAN2  Readout value Fan Speed 2 (RPM).
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_FAN3  Readout value Fan Speed 3 (RPM).
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_FUFREL  Readout of the FAN UNIT Release Firmware.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_FUTEMP  Readout of the FAN UNIT Temperature.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_FUSNUM  Readout of the FAN UNIT serial number.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_CRST  Readout value Crate status.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_VPMAX  Readout value maximum of OVP/UVP.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_VPMIN  Readout value minimum of OVP/UVP.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_RS232BR  Readout Bit Rate RS232 : 0..4.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_CANBR  Readout Bit Rate CANBUS : 0..5.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_CANADD  Readout Address CANBUS : 0..255.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_IPADD  Readout Address IP : xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_IPMSK  Readout IP Netmask : xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_IPGTW  Readout Gateway : xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx.
V8100_CMD_CR_MON_MACADD  Readout Mac Address : xx.xx.xx.xx.xx.xx.
V8100_CMD_CR_SET_ON  Crate ON.
V8100_CMD_CR_SET_OFF  Crate OFF.
V8100_CMD_CR_SET_SYSR  Sends VME System Reset.
V8100_CMD_CR_SET_CLR  Clear Alarm.
V8100_CMD_CR_SET_FANSP  Set Fan Speed. Values 0..6.

Definition at line 108 of file V8100.h.

enum _V8100_FAN_SPEED_SET

Fan speed setting values (RPMs).

Enumerator:
V8100_FANSP_OFF  Fan OFF.

Definition at line 200 of file V8100.h.

Function Documentation

DLL_API BOOL V8100_close ( V8100_data *  p_data  ) 

V8100 boards closing and resource free.

Provides specific handling for V8100 boards closing.

Parameters:
p_data Pointer to board data
Returns:
TRUE: board successfully closed
Note:
Must be called when done with any other board specific API.

DLL_API BOOL V8100_open_com ( V8100_data *  p_data,
const char *  com_str,
V8100_RS232_BITRATE  bitrate 
)

V8100 boards data initialization and serial communication device opening.

Provides specific handling for V8100 boards opening on serial communication device.

Parameters:
p_data Pointer to board data
com_str The serial communication device to open e.g COM1.. COM# for Windows or /dev/ttyS0.. /dev/ttyS# or /dev/ttyUSB0.. /dev/ttyUSB# for Linux
bitrate The serial device communication baudrate
Returns:
TRUE: board successfully opened
Note:
Must be called before any other board specific API.
